TopicTitle: Kerbal Space Program-Mining ship to Minmus Updated!

Articles.Content:
VIDEOS UPDATED!

I fly my my first Minmus landing mission. I have already setup my satellite scanner and a small Kerballed (manned) orbital station around Minmus. It is all prepared for my mining ship. Soon to come, I will be doing another video where I send a cargo rocket up to replace the gigantic solar array I broke on the way. I am currently running game version 1.02 and I have KIS,KAS amongst other mods installed. I hope you enjoy the videos. 

![minmus%20mission%20poster.jpg](https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/673200/minmus%20mission%20poster.jpg)

NEW VIDEOS ADDED

Check my original post, new videos added!

Just added some new videos to my Minmus playlist. I have done the repair mission, not exactly to plan, but I came up with a different solution. KIS and KAS is an awesome mod, I can't play without it now.
